utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey guys!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We need to talk to you about something.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. We don't feel like we can host Thanksgiving this year.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you kidding?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, it's just with uhm, work and the stress of adoption, we just don't feel like we have the energy. Plus, we don't think it's fair that every year the burden falls on us.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That doesn't sound like you... That's Monica talking!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, no! We made this decision together.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She's putting words in your mouth!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't you put words in people's mouths, you put turkey in people's mouths!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can't believe this! This is Emma's first Thanksgiving!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, it's not!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It's not? When was she born?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, personally I think it's great you're giving yourself a break.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you, Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure. It's just as well... I mean, last year wasn't very good. I think she's losing her touch.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? You are way off, lady!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Am I? Really? Am I? Well, why don't you cook Thanksgiving dinner and prove me wrong! Well, think about it, think about it, you'll be trying to top than you did last year. You'd be in competition... with yourself.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's my favourite kind! Okay, we are doing this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Don't let yourself get manipulated this way!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, stay out of this, Chandler! This is between me... and ME!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We are supposed to make these decisions together! Did you not watch the Doctor Phil I taped for you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Happy Thanksgiving!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, happy needless-turkey-murder day.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You guys, I ordered some chocolate pies from that bakery on Bleecker. Could you pick them up for me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You're not making the pies yourself?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, no, no, I don't make chocolate pies. When I was younger I entered this pie-eating contest. I ate so many that just the thought of them made me sick.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Did you at least win the contest?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: 2 minutes, 12 pies and a part of one tin! Okay, I see you guys at 4.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Can't wait!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This dinner is gonna be so great! In your face, last year "me"!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey Rach.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What's Emma doing today?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, let's see... uh... I know that she has a meeting with her lawyer and then she has to make a very big poop. Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I wanna enter her in a baby beauty pageant.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! That's the creepiest thing I've ever heard!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, but, well, before you say no, my friend Susanne is entering her kid and compared to Emma she's a real dog!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Phoebe, all babies are beautiful!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh... okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, just the idea of pitting one baby against another, I mean, you know, and judging who's cuter just for a trophy...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And a thousand dollars.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ...is something I'm very interested in! Oh please, do not tell Ross. He still believes that what's in the inside is important...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, oh, and Emma needs a cowgirl outfit for the competition.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Where am I gonna get a cowgirl outfit on Thanksgiving?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I was thinking...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, take the clothes of Joey's Cabbage Patch Kid.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did someone drop the baton again?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why come all the way from Kansas to do that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don't get older. I just get better!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know what just occurred to me? This could be our last Thanksgiving just the two of us. I mean, we could be getting a baby soon!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You don't know that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Somebody is gonna pick us.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, but we haven't heard a thing from the adoption agency and it has been weeks!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm telling ya! It's gonna happen. Next year it's gonna be you, me and the little Hemingway Bing. What, he's my favourite author!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Name one of his books.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: "The Firm"?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, let's see... uhm, okay, the turkey is in the oven, the stuffing is ready...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know, you always cook this meal all by yourself. Let me help this year.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, Chandler, that's sweet. But you don't have to do everything Doctor Phil tells you to do.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm serious, let me do something, just not the turkey or the stuffing, nothing "high profile".

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, let's see... Oh, the cranberry sauce, it is easy to make and no-one really cares about it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Tell me more.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I'm gonna go check on something across the hall. You start by washing these Not with soap!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You obviously haven't tasted my Palmolive potatoes!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Hey, guess what Joey has!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Three tickets to today's Rangers game!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude, I wanted him to guess.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, they're great seats too!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Guess where they are?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Center ice.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did I do something to you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hmm, the game's at one.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Dinner is at four, we'll never gonna make it back.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So we'll leave before it's over, we'll be back in time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You say that now, but it could take us a long time to get back home. Plus Joey could get lost and and they could have to page us to go pick him up.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, two times that happened!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, Monica has been working hard all day, she didn't wanna host this thing in the first place, we shouldn't go!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He's right, man.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Right, I guess. Alright, so see you at four.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. And get ready to taste my very special cranberries. Or should I say... chanberries!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's some gentle comedy, dude.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We're still going at the game, right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Host
utterance.content: This is contestant number sixteen, Rebecca...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Phoebe, listen. Well, I think we gotta go. This place is really freaking me out. I've been watching this guy over there, I don't think he came with a kid!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We can't leave now! There was this one baby, Haley, who was favourite to win and she got croup, so she had to stay home! This competition just blew wide open, folks!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, I think... It's just too weird, I just saw a one year old running around with pantyhose on!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I know, we should have been more prepared. It's okay. Now, the way I see it, our real competition now is Cameron. Oh my God, they just took her sweater off. Look at those arms! Hello Michelin Man.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Phoebe! Come on! You know what, it's already three o'clock and they haven't even gotten to Emma's group yet. We gotta go, we got dinner!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But Emma's got what it takes, she could go all the way!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, you have to calm down.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Rachel, the hottest babies in the Tri-State Area are in this room right now! I overheard one of the judges say that not one of them holds a candle to Emma!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You heard them say that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, okay. Alright, let's give to these babies something to cry about!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good! Oh yay! Let's get down to business! Emma needs some makeup!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, what?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, she's gonna look all washed out next to the other contestants!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No Phoebe, I am not letting you put makeup on my baby!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why not!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because I already did!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, Bob, get off the guy!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh! What a game, huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe Chandler is missing this!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. I am sorry he's not here too, but I got to say, I am really enjoying Nacho Chair.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I'd probably enjoy it more if you didn't keep batting my hand away.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohhhh! These seats are great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know, I know! When I was here for Holidays on Ice I was sitting so far away Michelle Kwan couldn't read my banner!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow, hey, we'd better get going. If we don't leave right now, we'll be late for dinner.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, but it's a kind game! So we're a little late, you know, the girls will be there, let's stay just for one more goal.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: One more fight!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Where is everybody? They're forty-five minutes late!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can't believe they are not here! I slave and I slave for what? They've ruined cranberry day!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How late are we?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Forty-five minutes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Rachel and Phoebe are already there, okay? So they probably started without us. We could just slip in and no-one needs to know where we were!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You may want to lose the foam finger!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, no, no, no, no, no. You just want to put it on your hand!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You are not at Thanksgiving?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, we're late!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What are you doing here!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We're late too!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We figured we could be late because you guys were gonna be on time

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Don't point that thing at me, Tribbiani!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, nobody's here? Monica's gonna kill us!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, where were you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, what's with the trophy!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh, we were at the Spelling Bee!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And I won!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You won an adult Thanksgiving day spelling bee.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes! Y-E-S. Yes!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Let me see this... Grand Supreme Little Darling, New York Division.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. That's me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You entered Emma into a Beauty Pageant?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And it looks like she put makeup on her!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wait a second, wait a second, where have I seen that cowgirl outfit before...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe this, she's our daughter! That you would treat her like some kind of showdog is inexcusable!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She won a thousand dollars!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So this is an annual thing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! That's Alicia Mae Emory's outfit!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys, there are people in there who are not getting any happier!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. What are we gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I don't know, you guys figure it out, I got to put Emma down for a nap.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right. Hey Rach, while you're in there, throw something on Alicia Mae.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Alright, what are we gonna say?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ooh, we'll say that we were mugged! You can't get mad at someone who's been mugged!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, good, that's good, but you don't look like you were mugged!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. Here

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: HEY!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you hear something?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They're out there!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohhh! Let me see! Oh God, I can't believe this! They're an hour late and they're just staying out there, talking!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Everything is so distorted! Looks like Joey has a giant hand! Which says "Rangers" on it. They went to the game!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oooh! They are in for a world of pain!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross' shirt is torn.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh! They're late and they're sloppy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, Emma is napping... what happened to your shirt?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I got mugged. And they stole my pocket.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We're just... we're trying to figure out an excuse. Hey! Ooh! How about this: We can say that Monica told us 5 o'clock, not 4 o'clock. That way we're right on time! OR... or, we can plant PCP in the apartment and call the cops on her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That would be a good way to get rid of all the PCP we have lying around.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know what, we just say that she said it was 5 o'clock. We'll just act casual. We're not late, we're right on time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We know you're out there.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who do you think its from?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, God. This is bad. This is so bad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, let's just go in there and face them.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I'm not going in first. I bet that vein on Monica's forehead is popping like crazy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I hate that thing, it's like a... bolt of lightning.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hey, I have an idea. Why don't we play rock-paper-scissors, and whoever loses goes in first. Ready? .

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah-haah! I win!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What is that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's fire. Beats everything.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, really? Does it beat water balloon? .

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh! Well played, Phoebe Buffay, well played.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, enough, enough, come on. Let's just all go in at the same time.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Alright, okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's locked.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wha...? Oh sure, now they lock it, but when they're having sex on the couch, its like: "Come on in, my butt is surprisingly hairy".

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, come on... Alright, you guys. We're so sorry we're late. Please let us in, so we can have dinner together.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! Everything's cold. The turkey's dried out and the... the stuffing is all soggy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, and there's a bowl of cranberry sauce that... what happens to cranberry sauce?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nothing. It's fine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh thank God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on you guys, we're sorry, alri...? Our subway broke down.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's a lie, you went to the game, I can see Joey's hand.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: FOR THE LOVE OF GOD TAKE IT OFF!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You guys, come on, it doesn't matter why we're late. We're all here now, please let us in so we can have some of your delicious turkey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I had a dream once about a fax machine that did that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's all the turkey you're gonna get.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How are we gonna decide who gets this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: WATER BALLOON!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are we gonna do? I'm starving.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I just remembered. We do have something to eat. Monica put something in our oven this morning.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, you touch that and you will be sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Guys, I'd listen to her. The vein is bigger than I've ever seen it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh... OH MY GOD IT'S BRUSSELS SPROUTS.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's worse than no food.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: HA-HA! All you got was Monica's stinky Brussels sprouts!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Stinky?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Please let me stay on this side of the door.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I know... I still have my old key! We can just unlock the door.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I don't know if that's such a good idea. They clearly don't want to be with us.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know what? I don't want to be with them either, but it's Thanksgiving and we should not want to be together, together.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Just get in there and make a face to face apology, you know? Look them in the eye. I know I can get them to forgive us.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't know...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm telling ya... I can do it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, he can do it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! It all looks so beautiful: the turkey, the stuffing...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The cranberries...?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh! Enough! A monkey could have made 'em!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey listen guys, we feel really terrible.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He's doing that weird eye contact thing. Don't look at him, don't look at him!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on you guys, we want you to know we're very very sorry. Right guys?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I feel terrible.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: So, so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now let's not ruin this day. You worked so hard. Let's move past this and try to have a nice meal all together, huh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The floating heads do make a good point.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, they do seem to feel pretty bad.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So bad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So bad.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So bad.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, okay. You two go get the dessert. And I'll let you in.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Dessert?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I asked you and Phoebe to pick up the pies. You did remember, right?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Pies, oh, we thought you said priiiize . Here! .

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Grand Supreme Little Darling?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Congratulatioooons!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! YOU FORGOT THE PIES? Well, I cannot believe this. You force me to make dinner, then you're an hour late and you forget the one little thing that I asked you to do.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really girls, not cool.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, you manheads aren't any better. You lied about going to the game. You knew it would make you late, and you still went anyway.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! I'm getting a little tired of this okay? We said we're sorry. It's Thanksgiving for Pete's sakes! A day of forgiveness!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's a day to be thankful.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't make me come up there!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's too late for apologies.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fine! Let's just go. I don't need your stupid dinner.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That would be a lot more convincing if you weren't drooling.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ewww, is that what that is?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sorry!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on you guys, let's just do our own Thanksgiving.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! I'll cook!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! Let's go out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! You three have a nice Thanksgiving.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The three of us?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! You, Chan, and the vein!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ha!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-oh! I'm stuck!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, that is not gonna work.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No seriously... I'm really wedged in here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'll pull you through.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: aaw-ahhh-aaahhh STOP! STOP! I'm worried about damaging my head.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: A little late for that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright, hurry up, you gotta do something.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright, well, this does not change anything. Okay, we need to get something to grease the sides of his face.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uhm, we've got turkey grease.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bring it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I just wanna say that I'm sorry I referred to the vein as a seperate person...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here you go!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, that smells good!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, try it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It isn't working.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright, we're gonna have to unscrew the chain.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well hurry, I can't feel my ears!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Can you ever feel your ears?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Interesting...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, where are your tools?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I left them on my bulldozer... I don't have tools!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I do, but Rachel borrowed them.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I lent them to Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I gave them to Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I left them at the park.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm finding it really hard not to mess with him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I've already stuffed a bunch of Brussel sprouts down his pants.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nice!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I have to get that. Now when I get back, I want you and your friends to be gone. Thanksgiving is over. The Vein has spoken.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's really starting to hurt.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, look, I'm gonna pull on the door and you guys push as hard as you can. Maybe we can get enough room to wiggle him out, okay? Okay, so PUSH!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Just a sec., we're kind in the middle of something here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh! Stop putting things down my pants!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on guys, PUSH!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Joey and Chandler
utterance.content: PUSH! PUSH! PUSH!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: My cranberries!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man, I've got food all over me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Argh! I can't believe what you did. Monica's gonna kill you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look! Look! Look what the... Look what... Look what the floating heads did!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don't care.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That was the adoption agency...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: WE'RE GETTING A BABY!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: There's a pregnant woman in Ohio, and she picked us!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm so happy for you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This Thanksgiving kicks last Thanksgiving's ass!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: To Monica and Chandler... and that knocked up girl in Ohio.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm just so happy you guys are finally getting a kid.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know. Have you considered pageanting?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't believe they called, and we're actually getting a baby.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I know how you feel...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure. I went through the exact same thing with Alicia Mae Emory... The waiting, the wondering... Then one day... I get that call from Toys "R" Us... She was in stock!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That is the exact same thing.
